content: kyle broflovski south park collection crochet pattern by aradiya 1 instruments and materials kyle broflovski 1 25 and 2 00 mm hooks orange flesh-colored light green green and black yarn sewing needle stuffing material a piece of white felt image 1 kyle broflovski - character of the popular cartoon south park to create a toy with a height of 7 5 cm you must crochet with single yarn using a 2 00 mm hook the arms are crocheted with single yarn using a 1 25 mm hook the stuffing material used in this toy is polyester wadding the piece of felt must be 1 5 mm thick this pattern is for personal use only sharing information from this pattern is prohibited if you publish photos of the toys that are crocheted following this pattern it is better to mention the author of the pattern you can also use hashtag #aradiyatoys at twitter and instagram to share your toy and see other toys that are created following aradiyatoys patterns 2 abbreviations chain - chain sl - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet increase - increase invdec - invisible decrease blo - back loops only flo - front loops only tip 1 the toy must be all amigurumi toys crocheted with tight are crocheted with stitches to be sure that tight stitches avoid small holes when there won t be any holes stretching crochet through which stuffing fabric if there are material can some tiny holes be seen use a smaller size hook to avoid seams all details are crocheted in a spiral without slip stitch and lifting loops there is a tip 2 chance that you to keep track of will lose the the beginning of the beginning of the row to avoid this row use a marker pin use a marker it can marker to the last loop be a colored pin or of the row every new thread of contrasting row must be finished color with a loop at the marker 3 head with flesh-colored yarn tip 3 to avoid uneven 1r 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 edges all details that 2r 6 increase 12 are made in spiral 3r 1sc increase repeat 6 times 18 technique must be 4r 2sc increase repeat 6 times 24 finished with a 5r 3sc increase repeat 6 times 30 slip_stitch 6r 4sc increase repeat 6 times 36 7r 5sc increase repeat 6 times 42 8r 6sc increase repeat 6 times 48 9-16r single_crochet in each single_crochet around 48 17r 6sc invdec repeat 6 times 42 18r 5sc invdec repeat 6 times 36 19r 4sc invdec repeat 6 times 30 20r 3sc invdec repeat 6 times 24 21r single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 stuff detail with stuffing material continue crocheting image 2 image 4 image 3 4 body connect light green yarn and cut flesh-colored one 22r flo 3sc increase repeat 6 times 30 23r single_crochet in each single_crochet around 30 connect orange yarn and cut light green
